data.name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: A genre spanning collection of original compositions by Purple Jam made for games within the Pitch Black universe, including all music from Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story.
data.about_the_game: A genre spanning collection of original compositions by Purple Jam made for games within the Pitch Black universe, including all music from Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story.
data.short_description: Over 25 minutes of original compositions created for the Pitch Black universe.

fullgame.name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Episode One
